name: Be The Potato
description:
Be an MLG potato and destroy a kitchen, raid the bathroom and spawn your potato friends from hell.

WASD to move,

Use mouse to move camera,

1 for speed boost,

2 for spawning potato friends,

And Shift to smash downward and Space for jumping.

"this is what happens when you get to the bottom of the recommended page on gamejolt" - SearchingForPlayers
